 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּחַ‎</span> **verb** ==rest== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נוּחַ‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נחת‎</span> noun ***rest***; possibly also verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ינח‎</span> (Iph. Perfect), compare [[BDB#Levy|Levy]] cited [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>i. 118</sup> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>322</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nâhu, rest (inûh)***</u></abbr>, and derivatives; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be extended, long***, rarely ***rest***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IV. is ***make camel lie down*** on his breast; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***resting-place of camel***, compare [[BDB#Doughty|Doughty]]<sup>Arab. Des. i, 397, ii, 63, 486, 642</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָ֫חָה‎</span> [[Isa.7.2|Isa 7:2]] + 2 t., consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָחָה‎</span> [[Isa.11.2|Isa 11:2]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָ֑חְתְּי‎</span> [[Job.3.26|Job 3:26]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָ֫חוּ‎</span> [[Esth.9.22|Esth 9:22]], consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָחוּ‎</span> [[Isa.7.19|Isa 7:19]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנוּחַ‎</span> [[Exod.23.12|Exod 23:12]] + 6 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫נַח‎</span> [[Exod.10.14|Exod 10:14]]; [[Exod.20.11|Exod 20:11]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּנוּחַ‎</span> [[Isa.25.10|Isa 25:10]]; [[Prov.14.33|Prov 14:33]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּ֫נַח‎</span> [[Gen.8.4|Gen 8:4]]; [[Num.11.26|Num 11:26]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּנוּחַ‎</span> [[Dan.12.13|Dan 12:13]] etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺחַ‎</span> [[Esth.9.16|Esth 9:16]]; [[Esth.9.17|Esth 9:17]]; [[Esth.9.18|Esth 9:18]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָנוּחַ‎</span> [[2Sam.21.10|2Sam 21:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּנוֺחַ‎</span> [[Num.11.25|Num 11:25]]; [[Josh.3.13|Josh 3:13]]; [[Neh.9.28|Neh 9:28]] suffix 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֻחֹה‎</span> [[Num.10.36|Num 10:36]] — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְנוּחֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[2Chr.6.41|2Chr 6:41]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנוּחָה‎</span>; — 

**1.** ***rest, settle down and remain***, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>; of birds [[2Sam.21.10|2Sam 21:10]] ark [[Gen.8.4|Gen 8:4]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָ֫חָה אֲרָם עַלאֶֿפְרַיִם‎</span> [[Isa.7.2|Isa 7:2]] ***Aram hath settled down upon Ephraim***; of spirit of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Num.11.25|Num 11:25]]; [[Num.11.26|Num 11:26]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Isa.11.2|Isa 11:2]] spirit of Elijah [[2Kgs.2.15|2Kgs 2:15]] sceptre of wicked [[Ps.125.3|Ps 125:3]] (in figurative); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> local: of insects [[Exod.10.14|Exod 10:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Isa.7.19|Isa 7:19]] (figurative of invaders); of soles of feet ***resting*** in water [[Josh.3.13|Josh 3:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); hand of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.25.10|Isa 25:10]] wisdom [[Prov.14.33|Prov 14:33]] anger [[Eccl.7.9|Eccl 7:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּקְהַל רְפָאִים יָנוּחַ‎</span> [[Prov.21.16|Prov 21:16]] ***in the assembly of Shades shall he settle down***; absolute, = ***stop***, of ark at stages of journey [[Num.10.36|Num 10:36]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); ***cease*** speaking [[1Sam.25.9|1Sam 25:9]]. 

**2.** ***repose, be quiet, have rest:*** after labour [[Exod.20.11|Exod 20:11]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; of God), [[Exod.23.12|Exod 23:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; of cattle), [[Deut.5.14|Deut 5:14]] (of slave); ***have rest from*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) enemies [[Esth.9.16|Esth 9:16]] (infinitive absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺחַ‎</span>, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמוֺד‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרוֺג‎</span>), v[[Esth.9.22|Esth 9:22]], compare (absolute) v[[Esth.9.17|Esth 9:17]] v[[Esth.9.18|Esth 9:18]] (in both + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשׂה‎</span>), [[Neh.9.28|Neh 9:28]] ***be at rest*** (from trouble), absolute, [[Job.3.26|Job 3:26]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלַוְתִּי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקַטְתִּי‎</span>); of the earth [[Isa.14.7|Isa 14:7]] in couch of the grave [[Isa.57.2|Isa 57:2]] in <abbr title="transliteration"><u>Sh®°ôl</u></abbr> [[Job.3.17|Job 3:17]], so probably [[Dan.12.13|Dan 12:13]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא תָּנוּחַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָךְ‎</span> [[Isa.23.12|Isa 23:12]] = ***thou shalt not be at rest***, compare impersonal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנוּחַ לִי‎</span> [[Job.3.13|Job 3:13]] = ***I should be at rest*** (in <abbr title="transliteration"><u>Sh®°ôl</u></abbr>). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָנוּחַ לְיוֺם צָרָה‎</span> [[Hab.3.16|Hab 3:16]] is dubious: ***I wait quietly for the day of distress*** [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]]-[[BDB#St|St]] [[BDB#SS|SS]], so [[BDB#Now|Now]], doubtfully; [[BDB#We|We]] conjectures <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶנָּחֵם‎</span> as [[Isa.1.24|Isa 1:24]] ***I will appease*** me, [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] leaves untranslated **Hiph\`il A.** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵנִיחַ‎</span> [[Josh.22.4|Josh 22:4]] +; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַהֲנִיחֹ֫תִי‎</span> [[2Sam.7.11|2Sam 7:11]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵנִ֫יחוּ‎</span> [[Zech.6.8|Zech 6:8]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנִיחַ‎</span> [[Exod.17.11|Exod 17:11]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫נַח‎</span> [[Josh.21.42|Josh 21:42]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנִיחֵנִי‎</span> [[Ezek.37.1|Ezek 37:1]]; [[Ezek.40.2|Ezek 40:2]] 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּנִיחֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Isa.63.14|Isa 63:14]] (but see below), etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָנִ֫יחוּ‎</span> [[Isa.28.12|Isa 28:12]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָנִיּחַ‎</span> [[Isa.14.3|Isa 14:3]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲנִיחִי‎</span> [[Ezek.24.13|Ezek 24:13]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵנִיחַ‎</span> [[Josh.1.13|Josh 1:13]] — 

**1.** ***cause to rest = give rest*** to: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** followed by accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדוֺ‎</span> [[Exod.17.11|Exod 17:11]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחִי‎</span> [[Zech.6.8|Zech 6:8]] so apparently followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמָתִי‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person, ***quiet*** (i.e. sate) ***my fury by*** (wreak it upon) [[Ezek.5.13|Ezek 5:13]] (strike out [[BDB#Co|Co]]), [[Ezek.16.42|Ezek 16:42]]; [[Ezek.24.13|Ezek 24:13]], also [[Ezek.21.22|Ezek 21:22]] ([[BDB#Co|Co]] adds <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** usually followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person: (1) ***give rest to*** i.e. bring to resting-place [[Exod.33.14|Exod 33:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.3.20|Deut 3:20]]; [[Josh.1.13|Josh 1:13]]; [[Josh.1.15|Josh 1:15]]; [[Josh.22.4|Josh 22:4]] (all [[BDB#D|D]]), [[1Chr.23.25|1Chr 23:25]] so, with suffix, [[Isa.63.14|Isa 63:14]] (si vera lectio; [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Lo|Lo]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Brd|Brd]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנְחֶנּוּ‎</span>, ***leadeth him***, √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נחה‎</span>); (2) of freedom from enemies, [[Isa.28.12|Isa 28:12]]; [[2Chr.14.5|2Chr 14:5]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכָּלאֿיבים‎</span> [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסָּבִיב‎</span>] [[Deut.12.10|Deut 12:10]]; [[Deut.25.19|Deut 25:19]]; [[Josh.23.1|Josh 23:1]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[2Sam.7.1|2Sam 7:1]]; [[2Sam.7.11|2Sam 7:11]]; [[1Chr.22.9|1Chr 22:9]] so + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסָּבִיב‎</span> alone [[1Kgs.5.18|1Kgs 5:18]]; [[Josh.21.42|Josh 21:42]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Chr.22.18|1Chr 22:18]]; [[2Chr.14.6|2Chr 14:6]]; [[2Chr.15.15|2Chr 15:15]]; [[2Chr.20.30|2Chr 20:30]], so also probably [[2Chr.32.22|2Chr 32:22]] (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַהֲלֵם מִסָּבִיב‎</span>); (3) of freedom suffering, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעָצְבְּךָ וגו‎</span> [[Isa.14.3|Isa 14:3]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***make quiet*** in mind, ***set at rest*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִינִיחֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Prov.29.17|Prov 29:17]] discipline thy son, ***that he may give thee quiet*** (of mind; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתֵּן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲדַנִּים לְנַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ‎</span>). 

**2.** ***cause to rest*** (i.e. ***light***) upon, with accusative ***staff*** + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Isa.30.32|Isa 30:32]] with accusative ***blessing*** + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> [[Ezek.44.30|Ezek 44:30]] ***cause to alight, set down***, with suffix person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּתוֺךְ‎</span> local [[Ezek.37.1|Ezek 37:1]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> [[Ezek.40.2|Ezek 40:2]] — For this meaning see especially **B.** below **B.** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנִּיחַ‎</span> [[Judg.3.1|Judg 3:1]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנִּחַ‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.9|1Kgs 8:9]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִנִּיחוֺ‎</span> [[Deut.26.4|Deut 26:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִנִּיחָם‎</span> [[Lev.16.23|Lev 16:23]] both consecutive; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִנַּחְתָּ֫‎</span> [[Deut.14.28|Deut 14:28]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִנַּחְתּוֺ‎</span> [[Deut.26.10|Deut 26:10]] consecutive, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַנִּיחַ‎</span> [[Lev.7.15|Lev 7:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּנַּח‎</span> [[Judg.2.23|Judg 2:23]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּנִּיחֵהוּ‎</span> [[Exod.16.34|Exod 16:34]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּנַּח‎</span> [[Gen.39.16|Gen 39:16]] 2 masculine singular jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתַּֿנַּח‎</span> [[Eccl.7.18|Eccl 7:18]] + 2 t., etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנַּח‎</span> [[Hos.4.7|Hos 4:7]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנִּ֫יחָה‎</span> [[Exod.32.10|Exod 32:10]]; [[Judg.16.26|Judg 16:26]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַנִּיחוֺ‎</span> [[Num.32.15|Num 32:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַנִּיחָם‎</span> [[Esth.3.8|Esth 3:8]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַנִּיחַ‎</span> [[Eccl.5.11|Eccl 5:11]] — 

**1.** ***lay*** or ***set down, deposit, let lie***, with accusative of thing, usually + word of place: stones at ford of Jordan [[Josh.4.3|Josh 4:3]]; [[Josh.4.8|Josh 4:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), ark [[1Sam.6.18|1Sam 6:18]], garments [[Gen.39.16|Gen 39:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Lev.16.23|Lev 16:23]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ezek.42.14|Ezek 42:14]]; [[Ezek.44.19|Ezek 44:19]] compare [[Exod.16.23|Exod 16:23]]; [[Exod.16.24|Exod 16:24]]; [[Exod.16.33|Exod 16:33]]; [[Exod.16.34|Exod 16:34]]; [[Num.17.19|Num 17:19]]; [[Num.17.22|Num 17:22]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Deut.26.4|Deut 26:4]]; [[Deut.26.10|Deut 26:10]]; [[1Kgs.8.9|1Kgs 8:9]]; [[1Kgs.13.31|1Kgs 13:31]]; [[Ezek.40.42|Ezek 40:42]]; [[Ezek.42.13|Ezek 42:13]] so, accusative omitted, [[Judg.6.18|Judg 6:18]]; [[Judg.6.20|Judg 6:20]]; [[Deut.14.28|Deut 14:28]]; [[Num.19.9|Num 19:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Sam.10.25|1Sam 10:25]] ***place, put***, followed by accusative of person + local modification, [[Gen.2.15|Gen 2:15]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.19.16|Gen 19:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Josh.6.23|Josh 6:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Lev.24.12|Lev 24:12]]; [[Num.15.34|Num 15:34]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Isa.14.1|Isa 14:1]]; [[Isa.46.7|Isa 46:7]]; [[Ezek.37.14|Ezek 37:14]] probably also [[Zech.5.11|Zech 5:11]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִנִּיחֻהָ‎</span>, see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72ee»§ 72ee</sup>); read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּנִּיחֵם‎</span> also [[2Kgs.18.11|2Kgs 18:11]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἔθετο</span>; for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּנְחֵם‎</span>; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיּשֶׁב אוֺתָם‎</span> \|\| [[2Kgs.17.6|2Kgs 17:6]]); ***place*** corpse on (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span>) ass [[1Kgs.13.29|1Kgs 13:29]], in grave v[[1Kgs.13.30|1Kgs 13:30]] horsemen and chariots in cities [[2Chr.1.14|2Chr 1:14]]; [[2Chr.9.25|2Chr 9:25]], so read also \|\| [[1Kgs.10.26|1Kgs 10:26]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἔθετο</span>; for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּנְחֵם‎</span>); tables in temple [[2Chr.4.8|2Chr 4:8]] idols in shrines [[2Kgs.17.29|2Kgs 17:29]] (accusative omitted). Here belongs perhaps also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְגַם מִזֶּה אַלתַּֿנַּח אֶתיָֿדֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Eccl.7.18|Eccl 7:18]] ***and also from this do not lest thy hand lie*** (idle), i.e. engage in it, compare [[Eccl.11.6|Eccl 11:6]] ***lay down forcibly, thrust down*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנִּיחַ לָאָרֶץ בְּיָד֑‎</span> [[Isa.28.2|Isa 28:2]], compare [[Amos.5.7|Amos 5:7]] perhaps also [[Ezek.22.20|Ezek 22:20]] (absolute; but strike out [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]], after [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]). 

**2.** ***let remain, leave*** (in present condition), object nations [[Judg.2.23|Judg 2:23]]; [[Judg.3.1|Judg 3:1]]; [[Jer.27.11|Jer 27:11]], people in wilderness [[Num.32.15|Num 32:15]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִנִּיחוּךְ עֵירֹם וְעֶרְיָה‎</span> [[Ezek.16.39|Ezek 16:39]] followed by accusative of thing [[Lev.7.15|Lev 7:15]]; [[1Kgs.7.47|1Kgs 7:47]] (leave unweighed); ***leave behind*** followed by accusative of person [[Gen.42.33|Gen 42:33]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Sam.16.21|2Sam 16:21]]; [[2Sam.20.3|2Sam 20:3]]; [[1Kgs.19.3|1Kgs 19:3]]; [[Jer.43.6|Jer 43:6]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתפְּֿנֵי‎</span> [[1Sam.22.4|1Sam 22:4]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּנִּחֵם‎</span>, for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּנְחֵם‎</span>, ***and he left them with*** [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] Löhr [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]; ***leave*** name, for a curse [[Isa.65.15|Isa 65:15]] ***leave*** or ***bequeath*** to (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>), with accusative of thing, [[Ps.17.14|Ps 17:14]]; [[Eccl.2.18|Eccl 2:18]]. 

**3.** ***leave*** = depart from, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקוֺמְךָ אַלתַּֿנַּח‎</span> [[Eccl.10.4|Eccl 10:4]] ***do not leave thy place***. 

**4.** ***abandon***, followed by accusative of person [[Jer.14.9|Jer 14:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּלתַּֿנִּיחֵנִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעשְׁקַ֑י‎</span> [[Ps.119.121|Ps 119:121]] ***abandon me not to my oppressors***. 

**5.** ***let alone*** (refrain from interfering with), followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[Exod.32.10|Exod 32:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[Hos.4.17|Hos 4:17]]; [[2Sam.16.11|2Sam 16:11]]; [[2Kgs.23.18|2Kgs 23:18]] followed by accusative of person [[Esth.3.6|Esth 3:6]] = ***avoid*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַנִּיחַ חֲטָאִים גְּדוֺלִים‎</span> [[Eccl.10.4|Eccl 10:4]] (but read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנִיחַ‎</span>, ***causeth to rest*** = ***allayeth*** compare [[BDB#Wild|Wild]]). 

**6.** ***permit***, with accusative of person [[Judg.16.26|Judg 16:26]] + infinitive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא הִנִּיחַ אָדָם לְעָשְׁקָם‎</span> [[Ps.105.14|Ps 105:14]] = [[1Chr.16.21|1Chr 16:21]], but here <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנִּיחַ לְאִישׁ‎</span>, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַנִּיחַ לוֺ לִישׁוֺן‎</span> [[Eccl.5.11|Eccl 5:11]]. **Hoph\`al A.** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוּנַּחלָֿ֑נוּ‎</span> [[Lam.5.5|Lam 5:5]] i.e.***no rest is granted to us***; for 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֻנִ֫יחָה‎</span> [[Zech.5.11|Zech 5:11]] [so [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]]; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎והֻנּ‎</span>] read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִנִּיחֻהָ‎</span> see above **Hiph\`il B. 1. B.** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֻנָּ֔ח‎</span> as substantive = ***space left, open space*** [[Ezek.41.9|Ezek 41:9]]; [[Ezek.41.11|Ezek 41:11]] (twice in verse). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺחַ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוח‎</span> ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּחַ‎</span> [[2Chr.6.41|2Chr 6:41]] see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנוּחָה‎</span>. below,
